content_html:
Join AI and Deep Learning leaders - KDnuggets Offer 

We'd like to update KDnuggets readers on RE•WORK's upcoming European events, as discounted tickets end next week, and share their on-demand content and expert interviews!  

KDnuggets subscribers get 20% off pass prices for all RE•WORK events. Use the discount code KDNUGGETS to book your place at an upcoming event in San Fran, Boston, Montreal, London, Amsterdam or Hong Kong now.

Deep Learning Summit & Virtual Assistant Summit

ETC 155 Bishopsgate, London, 21 - 22 September 2017

Join over 500 industry experts, leading academics and the most promising startups to discover advances and trends in neural networks, speech recognition, image retrieval, virtual assistants, and much more. Meet the world’s leading AI innovators to understand and progress the impact of this rapidly advancing technology on business and society.

Speakers include:
  • Irina Higgins, Research Scientist, Google DeepMind
  • Shubho Sengupta, AI Research, Facebook AI Research
  • Ankur Handa, Research Scientist, OpenAI
  • Andrew Tulloch, Research Engineer, Facebook
  • Christopher Bonnett, Senior Machine Learning Researcher, alpha-i
View the draft agenda and further details here. Discounted Super Early Bird tickets end Friday 12 May. Register early as tickets always sell out weeks in advance!
CONFIRM YOUR PLACE NOW

Machine Intelligence Summit & Machine Intelligence in Autonomous Vehicles Summit

Postillion Convention Centre Amsterdam, 28 - 29 June 2017

After successful editions in San Francisco, New York and Berlin, RE•WORK will now bring together over 300 attendees from industry, academia and startups to explore the opportunities of advancing trends in machine learning and their applications in business and society. Learn from global experts in pattern recognition, NLP, computer vision, robotics, autonomous systems and much more.

Speakers include:
  • Damian Borth, Director Deep Learning Competence Center, DFKI
  • Neal Lathia, Senior Data Scientist, Skyscanner
  • Sven Behnke, Head of Autonomous Intelligent Systems Group, Uni. of Bonn
  • Michael Hofmann, Manager Software Engineering, TomTom
  • Peter Tegelaar, Chief Data Scientist, Catawiki
  • Jan Erik Solem, Co-founder & CEO, Mapillary
  • Appu Shaji, Head, Research & Development, EyeEm
View further details and the agenda here. Early Bird tickets end on Friday 12 May. Use the KDNUGGETS discount to save €319 off the standard price.
REGISTER NOW WITH DISCOUNT CODE

VIDEOS & INTERVIEWS


Can't attend a RE•WORK event? Read speaker interviews and watch video presentations online. They've picked out a few of their favourites for you:

To read:
  • Discovering Extrasolar Planets with Deep Learning: Ingo Waldmann, Senior Research Scientist at UCL
  • The A.I. Gold-Mine: Predicting Stock Market Success: Yaron Golgher, CEO and Co-founder of I Know First
  • Using AI to Estimate Customer Life Time Value in E-Commerce: Ben Chamberlain, Senior Data Scientist at ASOS
To watch:
  • Self-Driving Cars: the Tech & the Roadblocks: Lex Fridman, Postdoctoral Researcher at MIT
  • OpenAI Universe: Ilya Sutskever, Research Director at OpenAI
  • Addressing the Critical Issues of Deep Learning in Medical Imaging: Ben Glocker, Lecturer in Medical Image Computing at Imperial College London

Contact Nikita for further information on RE•WORK or the events!

JOIN RE•WORK & MEET AI PIONEERS

Copyright © 2017 RE•WORK, All rights reserved.
